summary: Most BuildRequest items appear implemented: NGO navbar route fixes, user deliveries page linking to /tracking/$trackingId, testimonials section on landing page, seller rating + reviews, product description fallback, donation budget planner, checkout buy-vs-donate + anonymity flow, payment details panel, and a warm/neutral theme token update. One requirement (REQ-18) cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary, especially regarding non-empty dummy datasets across *all* role dashboards and delivery map-related dummy data.

missing_requirements.requirement: Populate all relevant pages/sections with realistic dummy data (maps, charts, analytics, tables, and lists) so dashboards and analytics views do not appear empty or placeholder-only, including dummy route/markers for any delivery map UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows dummy analytics for Admin and NGO pages, but does not provide evidence that dashboards/analytics pages across all roles (User/Delivery/Admin/NGO) are populated, nor that any delivery map UI (if present) uses dummy routes/markers. The relevant delivery map page(s) are not shown in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: AI-powered selling flow utilities and simulated AI features (category detection/price estimation/description generation) appear to be added/expanded beyond the requested scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on terminology, delivery section, testimonials, ratings, donation budget UI, checkout donate/anonymity + payment panels, dummy data fill, and NGO 404 fixes. The diff summary includes a simulated AI utility and a complete AI-driven sell-product flow which are not mentioned in REQ-9â€“REQ-19.
